contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:RoleArn
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the ARN of an IAM service role. Use to control which service role IAM users can use to work with stacks or change sets

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:RoleArn
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the ARN of an IAM service role. Use to control which service role IAM users can use to work with stacks or change sets

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:ResourceTypes
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the template resource types, such as AWS::EC2::Instance. Use to control which resource types IAM users can work with when they create or update a stack

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:TemplateUrl
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by an Amazon S3 template URL. Use to control which templates IAM users can use when they create or update stacks

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:ChangeSetName
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by an AWS CloudFormation change set name. Use to control which change sets IAM users can execute or delete

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:StackPolicyUrl
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by an Amazon S3 stack policy URL. Use to control which stack policies IAM users can associate with a stack during a create or update stack action

contextKeys.Name: aws:TagKeys
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

contextKeys.Name: cloudformation:ImportResourceTypes
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the template resource types, such as AWS::EC2::Instance. Use to control which resource types IAM users can work with when they want to import a resource into a stack

contextKeys.Name: aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}
contextKeys.Description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request
